Reviews.Title: Nice Big Phone , Great Value.
Reviews.Author: Johnathon Bell
Reviews.Content: I took a risk in buying a phone that had no previous reviews especially since it was a large  5.7 inch  screen android phone sold at a very cheap price. The fact that persuaded me to go ahead was that it was a fulfillment by Amazon listing and I had been bitten not once but many times by Chinese sellers selling trash and making it impossible for you to return.I opened the box to find a very  elegant looking Smartphone with an extremely useful stylus with it.The screen is big with pleasant colors and clarity. The touch response is awesome.Setting up my unlocked AT&T; card was a breeze.Many of the useful apps were already there and I have downloaded quite a few other apps like wechat and whatsapp  and am chatting with friends with clarity and precision.Downloading apps was fairly simple after I set up my Google account.The sound quality is extremely good.I had heard that the sc processor is relatively slow but I didn’t find it as a drawback in any way.Yes you can't compare it to a Samsung Galaxy but what more can you ask for one sixth of the price…..Overall a highly recommended phone. Great value for money.

Reviews.Title: Best hackers phone EVER! :)
Reviews.Author: Chris Swiontek
Reviews.Content: nice phone ....but..let me explain why:1-has a nice 2ghz dual core cpu (it fast)2- has "4gigs of system ram!" memory! Wowzers! its really freakn fast! my s4 only has half that! this thing is wicked quick!3- dual sim quad band (  works great with USA t-mobile and at@t )4- free wifi hotspot ! (if u  actually have a data plan)5- decent battery life for such a big screen(9hrs talk time on full charge- 5hrs if ur surfing web constantly-)now the just ok:1- no real internal storage (but puting a micro sd card in it solves that and its latest android os-so u can install to sd)2- touch screen isnt acurately calibrated out of box ( but downloading an external app to set it solved that minor problem really quick..no biggy)3- doesnt fit note3 hard shelll cases...but does fit some of the note3 soft cases..so experement a little.(ps. this phone was modelled aftet a note 3 by the way) and it Does come with the leather "flap over case" included..so its what i wanted for it anyway;)with all that being said..this is an amazing phone for those who actuall know what to do with it. for less than 100buks- u can get a phone thats more powerfull and faster than an note3 (but u have to add your own micro sd card to take advantage of this power) same size screen as a note3, clean video rez.. and.. to top it all off....it has a mali 300 graphic chipset (means u can run just about Any console emu you could dream of on this! ) i run playstation emu on this and its flawless!this phone is an absolute Powerhouse for the smart peoples!  if you have ever modded or sideloaded a android phone b4...you wil Love this phone omg!its amazing :)

Reviews.Title: Awesome large screen phone
Reviews.Author: Regi Sylvain
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a decent Android phone with a large screen this is ideal for you.It has all the qualities of a good android phone with a super 5.7 inch screen.Some of the great features of this phone are:Clear call quality no dropped calls or distortion.Easy set up. Takes a few second after the simcard is installed  and it automatically gets connected to the network.Camera takes fairly good pictures.Wi-fi connectivity and range is good.Bluetooth works fine.Downloading apps is fairly simple.Playstore and other important apps already exist.Overall great value for money.

Reviews.Title: love this phone and the company
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Hayes
Reviews.Content: So i ordered this phone and at first had trouble figuring it out. I emailed the company and they responded within an hour and were extremely helpful. I have straight talk. Yes this phone is compatible but you need to order a byop sim cars from straight talk. The screen is huge and i love it!!

Reviews.Title: Lightahead Unlocked GT-N7100
Reviews.Author: Christine Thomas
Reviews.Content: Won't download apps, sounds you're in a tunnel to party receiving calls. Phone sucks! Can't get in contact with Lightahead representatives to get help!

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: gretta erickson
Reviews.Content: Price and Functionality are just as described. Delivery was dead on.The addtional accesories that came with made my daughter very happy.Even considering getting one for myself and leaving my current carrier.

Reviews.Title: Lightahead Unlocked 5.7 inch touch screen Dual SIM phone
Reviews.Author: Rena M. Mason "Rena Marie Mason"
Reviews.Content: great phone at a wonderful price. A little difficult at first to figure out but after watching the instructional video on youtube I finally got it working now I just have to reenter all my contact number (didn't save to SIM Card) DUH!!!

Reviews.Title: need a cover please,.,
Reviews.Author: winnie atatai
Reviews.Content: Now i like it, but i need a cover for it, i cant fine any plastic cover or frame cover, if you guys can help me with it then it will very very good,.,,.thanks

Reviews.Title: Best phone
Reviews.Author: Olivier Kah
Reviews.Content: It keeps communication flowing between me and my wife. The phone is a perfect match for her. It was a dream phone. No complaint at the moment. She love it.

Reviews.Title: High quality big phone
Reviews.Author: desmond cruise
Reviews.Content: Tried to buy from Amazon but before I could complete the checkout the item disappeared.Bought it from lightheaded directly to my total satisfaction.Very fast phone large screen with clear display and super dual core processor.This one is fully unlocked. And set up is automatically.Great. For making calls watching movies and listening to music.Downloading apparently is simple and the 4gb memory a big helpSuper phone.

Reviews.Title: Sucks
Reviews.Author: Katyy
Reviews.Content: Though it came with a styles, that was not true. Didn't fit any of the cases bought. Would like to return as soon a I figure how to contract the seller

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: shenjack "shennajack"
Reviews.Content: i like the phone, but it actually has some issues,  as far as texing and signal i also cant hear to well on it , this would be a great phone for a child but im gonna try some more options before i get rid of it....

Reviews.Title: SOME FEATURES DO NOT WORK
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for the large display and that is probably it's best feature.  I can't connect to my data, I can't play any videos in You Tube or on Facebook.  The on-screen keyboard does not match up with what you're pressing.  This is not what I expected at all.

Reviews.Title: sucks for real
Reviews.Author: Julius Johnson
Reviews.Content: phone officially sucks i do not like it it freezes up and cuts off. i would not buy another oone

Reviews.Title: No GPS and Touch Screen is Out of alignment
Reviews.Author: Xiaolangdi
Reviews.Content: I cant say anything good about this phoneCamera not worth a 1 mp Shooterdoes not work with Tmobile Data which was updated after I bought the phoneGps NoTouch screen is not accurate at allDont Buy this phone get the Blu 5.7 one

Reviews.Title: Several issues
Reviews.Author: sherica
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for a little over a month and have had to call straight talk twice to reset the data settings because I lose service completely. I lose signal just about everywhere even at home. Also alot of apps dont seem to be compatible or work properly. The media volume button will default to mute and I cannot change it back therefore i cannot play music or videos. Now last but not least the batteries or the phone will not charge. I have not been able to use it in 2 days. Tried the spare battery and even other chargers and nothing works!

Reviews.Title: This phone is one of the best one around for the price offer
Reviews.Author: eea3bags
Reviews.Content: The phone do have some great app.But the only problem is no GPSAll in all I will say for anyone who wish tohave it go for it.

Reviews.Title: Data Connection
Reviews.Author: Donnita Tony
Reviews.Content: Sucks phone will not connect to the data you can't get on the internet unless you are connected by WIFI

Reviews.Title: TOTALLY DIS-SATISFIED
Reviews.Author: Shelly-Ann Mc Farlane
Reviews.Content: THE ONLY THING GOOD ABOUT THIS TRANSACTION WAS THE TIME I RECEIVED IT. WHAT WAS DESCRIBED AS THE SPECS ON THIS HANDSET WAS FAR FROM THE TRUTH. WHEN I RECEIVED THE PACKAGE THE ASSESSORIES WERE USED AND DIS-COLOURED,THE QUALITY OF THE PICTURES ARE FUZZY AND NOT VERY CLEAR EVEN WHEN THE FLASH IS ACTIVATED, THE MUSIC VOLUME IS EXTREMELY LOW. REFUND NECESSARY....

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: Adam L.
Reviews.Content: TThe phone is big with a lot of memory. that's the only good thing i can say about it. its very slow. apps constantly crash. the batteries die quick. its slow. mms messaging don't work. the 2g signal is terrible. the touch calibration is way off. all in all its a terrible phone.

Reviews.Title: NO
Reviews.Author: David D'Aprile
Reviews.Content: LISTEN UP this phone is a P.O.S the screen is not oriented correctly, apps close out and the stylus pen doesnt even get a response, yes its fast, its big, GOOGLE IS IN CHINESE. Screw this phone, returning right away

Reviews.Title: Unbeatable price!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dawn Finley
Reviews.Content: No one believes what I paid for this phone.  It is a great value!  The quality is just fine for me, may not be for you if you need the fastest phone around. One thing is certain, no one can touch this price for a 5.7 inch screen.

Reviews.Title: IT DONT WORK WITH WALMART MOBILE
Reviews.Author: EDWARD
Reviews.Content: OPEN THE BOX I WAS SO EXCITED, THAT ENDED QUICK!!, ADD SAY THAT PHONE IS SUPPOSE TO WORK WITH T-MOBILE, (((NOT)))!!!!!

Reviews.Title: no memory worst thing ever do not watste your money
Reviews.Author: ramond hunt
Reviews.Content: da whole thing is a Chinese phone cant change time its all in Chinese format and no memory what so ever

Reviews.Title: major issues
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: bought it as a spare of the moment deal.  shipping was great. item arrived on time. however the phone itself was not so good to say the least. touch screen was terrible. not working correctly at all. speakers are sub par. cant even make out a conversation while using speaker phone. luckily the seller issued a full refund. I ended up buying a 5.5 inch version of the same phone. I would pass on buying this phone if you want my opinion

Reviews.Title: no good phone
Reviews.Author: juan
Reviews.Content: This phone is junk need to trash it and buy a new phone need to put gps in phone and fix the bugs

Reviews.Title: I guess you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Theo Perkins
Reviews.Content: BAD:The touch screen is slightly off with no settings to fix. There is no GPS so cant have weather or google maps apps. 2G only network. With out WiFi very slow loading page. WiFi is slow also, guess cause it only have single core. Comes with a stylist that does not work at all. Cant change the screen dim settings, screen goes dim in 3 seconds. Have antutu benchmark on all phones i purchase and it graded the lowest compared to all phone in its class.GOOD:Lightahead company is a good company with fast delivery. Phone comes with a nice case, 2 battery's, The battery stand by time is nice, last a hole day +.

Reviews.Title: WTF PHONE NOT WORKING WTFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF
Reviews.Author: Dominique
Reviews.Content: i put my sim card in AND ITS STILL NOT WORKING WTF DIS IS GETTING ON MY NERVOUSE I NEED HELP PLEASE

Reviews.Title: would not recommend
Reviews.Author: rayray
Reviews.Content: beautiful phone it just wouldn't  hold a charge and it would freeze up you would have to take the battery out in order for it to unfreeze. sorry I ended up sending it back

Reviews.Title: BEWARE !
Reviews.Author: bukola fasasi
Reviews.Content: FIRST OF ALL, THE PHONE DID NOT COME WITH ALL THAT WAS PROMISED WILL BE INCLUDED. MEMORY IS VERY POOR. YOU CAN HARDLY SAVE ANYTHING WITHOUT SD CARD. CANNOT GET IT UNLOCKED. DON'T BUY IT.

Reviews.Title: don't buy this
Reviews.Author: don't buy this
Reviews.Content: Fast.... big... but.... don't buy this... it is a waste of money...but it is fine fit a small kid..considering the price..I'm not returning it... but I do not recommend it
